msbt.message: How did you get me the PERFECT birthday gift?! Are you a mind- reader or something? It was the top pick on the list I never wrote down anywhere! Anyway, I liked it so much, I got you something too.

I'll come out and say it—your gift was so good that I got a little misty over it. I must've done something right in life to have a friend like you. It means so much to me that I got you this in return.
Ain't no party like a birthday party, 'cause a birthday party don't stop making you feel surrounded by folks who care about you. Wow, that got real. Can't wait for next year's! Thanks for coming!

Thanks for the birthday present! It's just what I would've gotten for myself. I can tell that you GET me! I decided to get you a birthday gift too, but you know me and patience don't mix, so here it is now.

I was pretty stoked to open that gift you got me. I can tell you put some thought into it! That's the kind of thing that gives me a warm, fuzzy feeling inside. So I thought I'd do my best to return the favor!

Thanks for the birthday present! I wasn't expecting much, so to get something so cool blew me away. Usually the birthday gal doesn't GIVE presents, but since when do I care about the usual? Here ya go!
